body_html:
Edit: the above guess was incorrect.

It looks like torch.chunk's outputs have DynamicType(because their shape depends on the inputs) and
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp#L267-L276
attempts to create zeros like each output but can't because it doesn't have shape information

Edit: the problem seems to be very related to #6139

It looks like torch.chunk's outputs have DynamicType(because their shape depends on the inputs) and

body:
Edit: the above guess was incorrect.

It looks like `torch.chunk`'s outputs have `DynamicType`(because their shape depends on the inputs) and 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp#L267-L276
attempts to create zeros like each output but can't because it doesn't have shape information

Edit: the problem seems to be very related to #6139
